articles.title: New batch of China's Sinopharm Covid-19 vaccines arrive in Thailand - The Star Online
articles.description: A new batch of China's Sinopharm Covid-19 vaccines arrived in the Thai capital of Bangkok on Sunday, giving support to the Southeast Asian country's battle against its worst wave of outbreak of the pandemic so far.

articles.title: Myanmar forces kill 25 in raid on town: Sources - CNA
articles.description: Myanmar security forces killed at least 25 people on Friday (Jul 2) in a confrontation with opponents of the military junta at a town in the centre of the Southeast Asian nation, a resident and Myanmar-language media said on Sunday.
